verses.text: Now the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w was|strong="H7458"\w* still \w severe|strong="H3515"\w* \w in|strong="H7458"\w* the land.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Jacob’s sons \w had|strong="H1961"\w* eaten \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w grain|strong="H7668"\w* they \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w their|strong="H7725"\w* father said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w more|strong="H7725"\w* food.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w solemnly|strong="H5749"\w* \w warned|strong="H5749"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w* \w unless|strong="H1115"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* brother \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.’

\w If|strong="H3426"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w our|strong="H7971"\w* brother \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w us|strong="H7971"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* food \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* told \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H7971"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* brother \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.’”

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w bring|strong="H7489"\w* \w this|strong="H5046"\w* trouble upon \w me|strong="H5046"\w*?” \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* man \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* brother?”

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w questioned|strong="H7592"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* detail \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="H4138"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* family: ‘\w Is|strong="H3426"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* father \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*? \w Do|strong="H3426"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* brother?’ \w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* accordingly. \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w possibly|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w say|strong="H6310"\w*, ‘\w Bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* brother \w here|strong="H3426"\w*’?”

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* father \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* once, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*—\w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H7971"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w guarantee|strong="H6148"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* safety. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* \w hold|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w personally|strong="H6440"\w* responsible. \w If|strong="H2398"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H2398"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* back \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w set|strong="H3322"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w then|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w bear|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* guilt \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w delayed|strong="H4102"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w gone|strong="H7725"\w* \w twice|strong="H6471"\w* \w by|strong="H7725"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* father \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w If|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w must|strong="H3947"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w then|strong="H3947"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*: \w Put|strong="H6213"\w* \w some|strong="H4592"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w best|strong="H2173"\w* \w products|strong="H2173"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* land \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* packs \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* man—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w spices|strong="H5219"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H3910"\w*, pistachios \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w almonds|strong="H8247"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* sacks. Perhaps \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mistake|strong="H4870"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* brother \w as|strong="H6965"\w* well, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* man \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w once|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w release|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* other brother \w along|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*. \w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, if \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w bereaved|strong="H7921"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w bereaved|strong="H7921"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w*, \w along|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* amount \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* well. \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* hurried \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brothers, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w steward|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H7200"\w* \w these|strong="H1004"\w* men \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w Slaughter|strong="H2874"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w animal|strong="H2874"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* dine \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* man \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* commanded \w and|strong="H1004"\w* took \w the|strong="H6213"\w* brothers \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w frightened|strong="H3372"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* been \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* been \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w here|strong="H5921"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* bags \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* \w time|strong="H8462"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*. “\w They|strong="H3588"\w* intend \w to|strong="H7725"\w* overpower \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5066"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w steward|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

“Please, sir,” they said, “\w we|strong="H3068"\w* really did \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* here \w the|strong="H3381"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* \w time|strong="H8462"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* food.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w lodged|strong="H4411"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* night, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* sacks \w and|strong="H3701"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, each \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* found \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* sack! \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w full|strong="H7725"\w* amount \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*.

We \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* additional \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* food. We \w do|strong="H3381"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w our|strong="H7760"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H7760"\w* sacks.”

“\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w fine|strong="H3701"\w*,” \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* steward. “\w Do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* father, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w treasure|strong="H4301"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* sacks. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* received \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w steward|strong="H1004"\w* \w took|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* men \w into|strong="H3130"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w provided|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H4554"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*.

\w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* brothers \w had|strong="H3588"\w* been \w told|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3130"\w* going \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w meal|strong="H4503"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s arrival \w at|strong="H8033"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w came|strong="H3130"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w they|strong="H3027"\w* presented \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w brought|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* ground before \w him|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w He|strong="H2205"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* if \w they|strong="H7965"\w* \w were|strong="H2205"\w* \w well|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H2205"\w* then \w he|strong="H2205"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w*, “\w How|strong="H7965"\w* \w is|strong="H2416"\w* \w your|strong="H7592"\w* elderly father \w you|strong="H7592"\w* told \w me|strong="H7592"\w* about? \w Is|strong="H2416"\w* \w he|strong="H2205"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*?”
